typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as integer,
		ReturnDate as integer,
		RentalCost as decimal(10,0),
		LateFee as decimal(10,0),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['FourthCoffee/Rentals/Transactions.csv']) ~> sourcefourthcoffee
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as integer,
		ReturnDate as integer,
		RentalCost as decimal(10,0),
		LateFee as decimal(10,0),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['VanArsdelLtd/OnPremRentals/Transactions/Transactions.csv']) ~> vanarsdel
sourcefourthcoffee derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		GlobalTransactionID = uuid(),
		TransactionID = lower(TransactionID),
		CustomerID = lower(CustomerID),
		MovieID = lower(MovieID),
		RentalDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(RentalDate), 4), '-', substring(toString(RentalDate), 5, 2), '-', substring(toString(RentalDate), 7, 2))),
		ReturnDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(ReturnDate), 4), '-', substring(toString(ReturnDate), 5, 2), '-', substring(toString(ReturnDate), 7, 2)))) ~> fourthcoffeederived
vanarsdel derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		GlobalTransactionID = uuid(),
		RentalDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(RentalDate), 4), '-', substring(toString(RentalDate), 5, 2), '-', substring(toString(RentalDate), 7, 2))),
		ReturnDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(ReturnDate), 4), '-', substring(toString(ReturnDate), 5, 2), '-', substring(toString(ReturnDate), 7, 2)))) ~> vanarsdelderived
fourthcoffeederived, vanarsdelderived union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
